title: Integrations management
subtitle: Control Filecoin brokers settings and deals acceptance directly from CIDgravity.

estuary.title: Estuary
estuary.subtitle: Estuary allow users to store public data on IPFS and Filecoin from any browser or using API

details.opener: Integrating Estuary with CIDgravity allows you to:
details.registerMiner: Automatically register your miner to Estuary and start accepting deals
details.setPublicName: Set the miner public name on <1>estuary.tech</1>
details.informEstuary: Inform Estuary to stop sending you deals when maintenance mode is activated or you blocked Estuary client on the client page

bidbot.title: Bidbot
bidbot.subtitle: Bidbot automates participation in Filecoin deal auctions, CAR file transfer, and Lotus import

details.opener: The integration with CIDgravity allows bidbot to:
details.dynamicBid: Bid based on dynamic pricing rules set in CIDgravity instead of prices hardcoded in Bidbot config file or with command-line flags
details.reflectMaintenanceMode: Reflect maintenance mode and client blocked states in Bidbot

error.generic: Unable to load connected integrations for your account. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
